title: Tech Live: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger on Chips Act, Geopolitics
description:
Global semiconductor companies are grappling with economic turmoil and steep global competition. Can the federal Chips Act and a push for domestic production in the U.S. help? Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger speaks with WSJ editor Thorold Barker at The Wall Street Journal’s Tech Live conference. Plus, Oculus and Anduril Industries founder Palmer Luckey discusses the metaverse and defense tech. Zoe Thomas hosts.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
